preparation.raw_text:
1. Accurately weigh 40.0 g of boron (B). 
 2. Accurately weigh 20.0 g of beryllium (Be). 
 3. Accurately weigh 10.0 g of iron (Fe). 
 4. Accurately weigh 10.0 g of niobium (Nb). 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine all measured powders thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer to ensure uniform distribution.
